alert.note: Alert for Brown; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 12:52PM MST until March 01 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 3 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse County. In South Dakota, Brown, Marshall and Roberts Counties. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 3 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow will occur Tuesday evening through early Wednesday morning north of Hwy 12, especially right along the ND/SD border where banding is most likely.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
